name: Cartographic Information Model spec
description: Map content specification used to persist and transfer cartographic descriptions of GIS datasets represented in JSON.

name: Common data types
description: JSON formats of the geometry and spatial reference objects as returned by ArcGIS REST API: Point, Multipoint, Polyline, Polygon and Envelope.

name: GeoServices spec
description: Open Web Foundation REST-based API that provides a complete access to structured geospatial data used by Esri.

name: Indexed 3D Scene Layers
description: Service and package standard of containers for arbitrarily large amounts of geographic data.

name: Shapefile Format
description: Spec for the geospatial vector data format for GIS software.

name: Spatial reference specifications
description: List of  Well-Known ID (WKID) integer value or a text string definition referred to as Well-Known Text (WKT) to define a spatial reference.

name: Tile Package Specification
description: Compressed file containing a set of tiles and a tiling scheme, which can be used as a basemap in ArcGIS applications.

name: Web Map spec
description: Sharable 2D maps. It describes the JSON object which defines a web map.

name: Web Scene spec
description: A JSON structure that defines the contents (viewpoint, camera, basemap layer, layers, styles, etc.) for a shareable 3D scene.
